thread.title: Takata Launching Recall Ad Campaign, Boosting Production of Air Bag Fix Kits
thread.title_full: Takata Launching Recall Ad Campaign, Boosting Production of Air Bag Fix Kits - WSJ

author: Anne Steele
title: Takata Launching Recall Ad Campaign, Boosting Production of Air Bag Fix Kits
text:
Takata Corp. said Monday it will launch an advertising campaign to reach more owners of vehicles carrying its recalled air bags that can spray deadly shrapnel when inflated, and the supplier also said it is ramping up the number of kits it is producing to fix the problem.
The Japanese parts supplier is looking to raise completion rates of the fix for the automotive recall, which stands at 19.2 million vehiclesâ€”among the largest in... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
